anya-e1208n:287_0: Tathā na sevetha na tassa doso;
anya-e1208n:290_0: Na tassa doso na sukhaṃ vajeyya,
anya-e1208n:295_0: Na tassa doso ta labhe tikicchaṃ,
anya-e1208n:482_0: Medhāya nando thiravāci kheme; (Kavināma gabbha cakkaṃ)
anya-e1208n:485_0: Dāyato vasato na’nusantāsassa hitesino; (Gāthaddhavisaya paṭiloma yamakaṃ)
anya-e1208n:488_0: Sakāyanā’nāya’kāsa vāma nā ga ganā’mavā; (Sabbato bhadda bandhanaṃ)
anya-e1208n:497_0: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe dūrenidāne sumedhabrāhmaṇāpadānaparidīpo.
anya-e1208n:510_0: Sambuddho so itipi arahaṃ tyādinā’bbhuggataṃ taṃ,
anya-e1208n:524_0: Abbhuggantvā atha himavatā so sumedho tapassi
anya-e1208n:525_0: Gacchaṃ tesaṃ upari nabhasā vākacīraṃ dhunanno,
anya-e1208n:542_0: Sajjetuṃ te sapadi muditā sādhavo tassa’daṃsu; ()
anya-e1208n:572_0: Sambuddhoyaṃ vajatu iti me dīgharattaṃ hitāya; ()
anya-e1208n:579_0: Sutvā gāthāpadampi na me bhāriyaṃ saṃkilese
anya-e1208n:602_0: Patvā bodhiṃ ahamiva siyā gotamo nāma buddho; ()
anya-e1208n:604_0: Tumhe sampassatha iti imaṃ tāpasaṃ saṅghamajjhe
anya-e1208n:611_0: Bimbā bimbā dharavati piyā hema bimbā bhirāmā
anya-e1208n:619_0: Assattho te vijayaviṭapī tvañca kho gotamavho
anya-e1208n:621_0: Pāyāsaggaṃ parivisiya bho tvaṃ sujātāya dinnaṃ
anya-e1208n:622_0: Bodhiṃ bujjhissasi iti dhuvaṃ bodhimūle nisajja; ()
anya-e1208n:639_0: Rammaṃ rammaṃ mahīya jaṭilaṃ pupphamuṭṭhīhi katvā
anya-e1208n:644_0: Tamhā ṭhānā gatasati jane sannisinnassa tassa
anya-e1208n:657_0: Āvajjesi kati iti sudhī dhammadhātuṃ sahetuṃ; ()
anya-e1208n:662_0: Nibbinno mā bhavi’ti paṭhamaṃ pāramiṃ’dhiṭṭhahi so; ()
anya-e1208n:677_0: Ajjhiṭṭhāsi tvamiti matimā pāramiṃ so catutthiṃ; ()
anya-e1208n:700_0: Sītattaṃ sampharati hi samaṃ vārinā bhāvayeni,
anya-e1208n:702_0: Ajjhiṭṭhāsi samuti navamiṃ pāramiṃ metta citto; ()
anya-e1208n:705_0: Majjhattā’yaṃ vasumativadhū hoti dukkhe sukheka vā,
anya-e1208n:706_0: Evaṃ bho tvaṃ bhava samatulāsantibho’pekkha ko’ti
anya-e1208n:719_0: Nikkaṅkhā te punapi nagarā nāgarā taṃ upecca
anya-e1208n:724_0: Mā te rogo bhavi paṭibhayaṃ mā bhavi chambhitattaṃ
anya-e1208n:730_0: Bodhātvo himavati sakaṃ assamaṃ tāpaso so,
anya-e1208n:748_0: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jitavaṃsadīpe dūrenidāne
anya-e1208n:748_1: sumedha tāpasassa mūlapaṇiṭhānaṭṭhapanapavatti paridīpo dutiyo saggo.
anya-e1208n:1043_0: Dve sīvali ñca samaṇīsu varā surāmā; ()
anya-e1208n:1209_0: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatitā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānanda dānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe dūrenidāne
anya-e1208n:1209_1: bodhisattassa sesapaṇidhātaṭṭhapana pavatti paridīpo tatiyo saggo.
anya-e1208n:1339_0: Pabbajjituṃ sapariso pavanaṃ jagāma; () (Soṇapaṇḍitacariyaṃ; Iti nekkhamma pārami;)
anya-e1208n:1349_0: Paññāpajāpatipati riputo mumoca; () (Mahosadhacariyaṃ iti paññā pāramī;)
anya-e1208n:1369_0: Khantiṃ pavattayi manappitakhantimetto; () (Dhammapāla cariyaṃ; Iti khantipāramī;)
anya-e1208n:1404_0: Daḷhaṃ adhiṭṭhitavataṃ vata nojahāsi; () (Temiyacariyaṃ; Iti adhiṭṭhāna pāramī;)
anya-e1208n:1414_0: Mettāya samphari samaṃ paribhāvitāya; () (Ekarājacariyaṃ; Iti mettā pāramī;)
anya-e1208n:1419_0: Veraṃ averamanupecca rarakkhu’pekkhaṃ; () (Lomahaṃsacariyaṃ; Iti upekkhāka pakāramiṃ)
anya-e1208n:1460_0: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānanda dānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe durenidāne
anya-e1208n:1504_0: Nisajjo paripāsāde so rājā ekadā raho,
anya-e1208n:1592_0: Yasmā akālo buddhānaṃ tasmā kālaṃ vipassi so; ()
anya-e1208n:1595_0: Jāyanti jambudīpasmiṃ tasmā dīpaṃ vipassi so; ()
anya-e1208n:1598_0: Jāyare majjhime dese tasmādesaṃ vipassi so; ()
anya-e1208n:1601_0: Khantiye brāhmaṇe buddhā kulaṃ tasmā vipassi so; ()
anya-e1208n:1613_0: Iti medhānandābhidhānenayatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānatidāne jinavaṃsadīpe durenidāne
anya-e1208n:1897_0: Rañño kathesi supinaṃ atha so narindo,
anya-e1208n:2115_0: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakala kavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe avidurenidāne
anya-e1208n:2365_0: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandananidāne jinavaṃsadīpe avidūrenidāne vividhapubbanimittapātubhāvappavatti paridipo.
anya-e1208n:2905_0: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānanda dānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe avidūrenidāne
anya-e1208n:2905_1: lakkhaṇapaṭiggahaṇa kumārasambharaṇādi pavatti paridipo aṭṭhamo saggo.
anya-e1208n:3156_0: Iti mbedhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe avidūrenidāne pāṇiggahamaṅakgalussavapavattiparidīpo.
anya-e1208n:3336_0: Yathariva gaṇikaṃ taṃ kañjaniṃ so janindo
anya-e1208n:3396_0: Iti varamati sutvā tāya gāthaṃ sugītaṃ
anya-e1208n:3491_0: Alamiti mama vāso handa nikkhamma tamhā
anya-e1208n:3580_0: Savisamiva pibanto taṃ tuvaṃ ko’si pucchi,
anya-e1208n:3636_0: Nabhasi khipi sikhaṃ taṃ iccadhiṭṭhāya dhīro
anya-e1208n:3673_0: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakala kavijana hadayānanda dānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe avidūre
anya-e1208n:3830_0: Nā go siyā paṭhaminimujjanaṃ ka re
anya-e1208n:3862_0: Mā kāhase sakha iti dukkaraṃ kharaṃ
anya-e1208n:3983_0: Vāsaṃ akā vasi mukhato ca nāsato
anya-e1208n:4229_0: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakala kavijana hakayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe avidurenidāne
anya-e1208n:4745_0: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakala kavakijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe avidūre
anya-e1208n:4745_1: nidāne devaputta mārabala viddhaṃsana pavattiparidīpo dvādasamo saggo.
anya-e1208n:4996_0: Iti medhānandābhidhānenayatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe avidure nidāne
anya-e1208n:5247_0: Iti medhānandābhidhānenayatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe avidure nidāne
anya-e1208n:5247_1: mahā bodhisattassa ariyamaggañāṇābhisambodhi samadhigama pavattiparidīpo cuddasamo saggo.
anya-e1208n:5457_0: Kiṃ tāta kiṃ tāta kimettha jhāyasi
anya-e1208n:5458_0: Ko te paro kena parājito tuvaṃ; ()
anya-e1208n:5467_0: Dassāma vo passatha tāta no balaṃ
anya-e1208n:5559_0: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santikenidāne
anya-e1208n:5562_0: Vikkhāletvā bhagavati mukhaṃ tasmiṃ nisinne sati,
anya-e1208n:5563_0: Vāṇijjatthaṃ nija janapadā dve bhātikāka vāṇijā
anya-e1208n:5568_0: Bhante tumhe anubhavatha no bhikkhaṃ paṭiggaṇhiya
anya-e1208n:5571_0: Sabbe buddhā nahi karatalambhojesu gaṇhanti kho
anya-e1208n:5576_0: Ekaṃ katvā samuti caturo patte adhiṭṭhāya te
anya-e1208n:5586_0: Patvā tesaṃ janapadamubho pakkhippa tā dhātuyo
anya-e1208n:5597_0: Deseyyaṃ kho paṭhamamasamaṃ dhammaṃ imaṃ duddasaṃ,
anya-e1208n:5608_0: Ācikkhitvā vimati matarī saññāya taṃ dūrato
anya-e1208n:5609_0: Nibbinditvā katika makaruṃ vaggā samaggā vasī; ()
anya-e1208n:5611_0: Ñatvā tesaṃ manasi vikatiṃ odissakaṃ samphari
anya-e1208n:5612_0: Mettaṃ cittaṃ narahari tato phuṭṭhāsamānā vasī,
anya-e1208n:5639_0: Vassāna’nte pahiṇi muni te bhikkhu disācārikaṃ; ()
anya-e1208n:5654_0: Rañño vācaṃ sumariya puraṃ rājaggahaṃ pāvisi; ()
anya-e1208n:5661_0: Bhetvā diṭṭhiṃ ciraparicitaṃ te kassapādī vasī
anya-e1208n:5662_0: Disvā rājā bhagavati tadā dhammaṃcarante tahiṃ,
anya-e1208n:5677_0: Uṇhākāraṃ janayi’ti tadā hutvā navo māṇavo,
anya-e1208n:5696_0: Āramaṃ taṃ parama ruciraṃ satthā paṭiggaṇhiya
anya-e1208n:5698_0: Tasmiṃ kāle paramamamataṃ ye daḷhamittā ubho
anya-e1208n:5714_0: Sutvā dhammaṃ adhigami vasī taṃ dhammasenāpatī; ()
anya-e1208n:5716_0: Dhammassāmī karahaci ubho te sāvakānaṃ mamaṃ
anya-e1208n:5717_0: Aggaṃ bhaddaṃ yugamiti ime pabyākarotto munī,
anya-e1208n:5722_0: Buddho hutvā padahiya ciraṃ nissāya rājaggahaṃ,
anya-e1208n:5743_0: Evaṃ vatvā kapuna saparisaṃ sokāphadāyiṃ tahiṃ
anya-e1208n:5757_0: Gantuṃ kālo’yamiti adhunā so kāludāyi vasī,
anya-e1208n:5764_0: Sāyaṃka pāto ahani vivaṭā sabbādisā pākaṭā; ()
anya-e1208n:5769_0: Dāvaggī te lavamapi manotāpāya vattanti kiṃ; ()
anya-e1208n:5793_0: Haṃsasseṇika sirasi vajato te bhuyate kiṅkiṇi-
anya-e1208n:5807_0: Jiṇṇo vuddho mamihapahiṇi tvaṃ daṭṭhukāmo pitā,
anya-e1208n:5821_0: Taṃ bhuñjanto divasadivase so yojanaṃ yojanaṃ
anya-e1208n:5826_0: Nānuppatte bhagavati puraṃ no ñātiseṭṭhaṃ kuhiṃ
anya-e1208n:5839_0: Nissoko so muni parihari sokandhakāraṃ pitu; ()
anya-e1208n:5844_0: Tumhegantvā paṇamatha jinaṃ vo piṭṭhitāhomै no; ()
anya-e1208n:5864_0: Vassaṃ vassi nijanakharuciṃ tesaṃ samāje sati; ()
anya-e1208n:5898_0: Gantvā sīghaṃ khaḷitavacatā putto mahārāja te
anya-e1208n:5916_0: Uttiṭṭhādiṃ avadi kasugamaṃ gāthaṃ ṭhito vīthiyaṃ
anya-e1208n:5932_0: Rājā saṅghaṃ sugatapamukhaṃ khajjena bhojjena ca,
anya-e1208n:5944_0: Taṃ kamaṃ daṭṭhuṃ nanupavisatī’tve’vaṃ vadantī ṭhitā; ()
anya-e1208n:5972_0: Sīghaṃ jālaṃ vivariya thiyā vīthiṃ vilokentiyā,
anya-e1208n:5974_0: Pattaṃ bhante haratha vacanaṃ bhatyā na taṃ vyākari; ()
anya-e1208n:5989_0: Eso tuyhaṃ naraharika pitā iccākaha pakassāhi naṃ; ()
anya-e1208n:5994_0: Yācassū’ti pahiṇi pituno ñattaṃ dhanaṃ pettikaṃ; ()
anya-e1208n:6001_0: Dāyajjaṃ me samaṇa dadataṃ atthodhanenā’ti me
anya-e1208n:6018_0: Sutvā kasuttaṃ puna taditaraṃ sikkhāgarūnaṃ garu-
anya-e1208n:6026_0: Rañño datvā varamati varaṃ bhuttāsano āsanā-
anya-e1208n:6046_0: Buddhatthaṃ so gahapati mahāmagge samagge divā-
anya-e1208n:6058_0: Tesaṃ sīsaharañjalihi mahito sutvāna taṃ sāsanaṃ
anya-e1208n:6060_0: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakala kavijana hadayānandadāna nidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santikeka
anya-e1208n:6060_1: nidāne bhagavato pakiṇṇaka caritappavatti paridīpo soḷasamo saggo.
anya-e1208n:6298_0: Yo sadātiya sadā kama taṃ sadā,
anya-e1208n:6310_0: Vanī janaṃ jetavane vinento; () (Caturakkharika citta yamakaṃ;)
anya-e1208n:6311_0: Iti medhānandābhidhānanayatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santike nidāne
anya-e1208n:6730_0: Iti medhānandābhidhānenayatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santike nidāne
anya-e1208n:6845_0: Yatana cha phassa cha vedanāti ceko; ()
anya-e1208n:6981_0: Iti medhānandābhidhānenayatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santike nidāne
anya-e1208n:7077_0: Iti medhānandābhidhānenayatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santikeka
anya-e1208n:7077_1: nidāne bhagavato kasammāsambuddhoti nāmapaññattiyā abhidheya paridīpo vīsatimo saggo.
anya-e1208n:7511_0: Iti medhānandābhidhānenayatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santike nidāne
anya-e1208n:7511_1: bhagavato vijjācaraṇa sampannoti nāmapaññattiyāabhidheya paridīpo ekavīsatimo saggo.
anya-e1208n:7512_0: Taṃkho pana bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ evaṃ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato itipi so bhagavā sugatoti.
anya-e1208n:7818_0: Tena so bhuvanattaye sugato siyāti suvissuto; ()
anya-e1208n:7823_0: Nātho sammā gato tato so sugato; ()
anya-e1208n:7824_0: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatināna viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santikeka
anya-e1208n:7824_1: nidāne bhagavato sutagoti paññattiyā abhidheya paridīpo.
anya-e1208n:7825_0: Taṃkho pana bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ evaṃ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato. Itipiso bhagavā lokavidūti.
anya-e1208n:7976_0: Itimedhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santikenidāne
anya-e1208n:7977_0: Taṃkho pana bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ evaṃ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato itipi so bhagavā anuttaro purisadammasārathīti.
anya-e1208n:8133_0: Itimedhānandābhidhānena yatinā varacite sakalakavijana hadayānanda dānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santikenidāne
anya-e1208n:8133_1: bhagavato anuttaro purisadammasārathīti nāma paññattiyā abhidheya paridīpo catubbīsatimosaggo.
anya-e1208n:8134_0: Taṃkho pana bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ evaṃ kalyāṇekitti saddo abbhuggato itipi sobhagavā satthā devamanussānaṃti.
anya-e1208n:8148_0: Sabrahmaṃ sanarāmaraṃ sasamaṇaṃ sabrāhmaṇaṃ yohi so
anya-e1208n:8153_0: Sattānaṃ tasasate vihiṃsati dhiyā siddhatthasāro tato
anya-e1208n:8160_0: Taṃkho panabhavantaṃ gotamaṃ evaṃkalyāṇe kittisaddo abbhuggato itipiso bhagavā buddhoti.
anya-e1208n:8165_0: Patto ñāṇabalesu pāpuṇi vasībhāvaṃ sayamabhuka sayaṃ; ()
anya-e1208n:8167_0: Bodhetā’ti pajāya nibbacanato saccāni so bujjhitā
anya-e1208n:8169_0: Matyā bujjhanasattiyā mahatiyā yasmā samaṅakgī tato
anya-e1208n:8184_0: Buddhambhojatibhānano hī bhagavā sāmaṃ pabuddho yato
anya-e1208n:8206_0: Itimedhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santikenidāne
anya-e1208n:8206_1: satthādevamanussānaṃ buddhoti nāmapaññattīnaṃ abhidheya paridīpo pañcavīsatimo saggo.
anya-e1208n:8207_0: Taṃkho pana bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ evaṃ kalyāṇe kittisaddo abbhuggato itipi sobhagavā bhagavāti.
anya-e1208n:8452_0: Na devatāhi ca nana yena kenaci racitaṃ,
anya-e1208n:8645_0: Mataṃ so pibanto vamī te ca bhāge; ()
anya-e1208n:8711_0: Itimedhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānanda dānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santikenidāne
anya-e1208n:8786_0: Itimedhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santikenidāte navannamarahādiguṇānaṃ saṅkhepanayaparidīpo
anya-e1208n:9096_0: Na ca taṃ paṭivijjhi neva yāci
anya-e1208n:9129_0: Appossukko samāno viharatu kalimā ho timāsaccayena
anya-e1208n:9137_0: Loko sokandhakāre paripati janito bhiṃsano lomahaṃso; ()
anya-e1208n:9138_0: Itimedhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santike nidāne
anya-e1208n:9138_1: bhagavato āyusaṅkhārossajjana pavatti paridīpo aṭṭhavīsatimo saggo.
anya-e1208n:9140_0: Yenā’nando vasati bhagavā tena gantvā nisinno
anya-e1208n:9142_0: Bhante sukkhāsati ca elitā hiṃsano lomahaṃso
anya-e1208n:9155_0: Gabbhokkanto bhacati ca yadā sampajāno satova
anya-e1208n:9158_0: Ete dhammā samaṇa mahato bhumicālassa hetu; ()
anya-e1208n:9175_0: Apposasukekā tvamiha kalimā hohi māsehi tīhi
anya-e1208n:9185_0: Sambodhiṃ tvaṃ yadi bhagavato saddahanto’si kasmā
anya-e1208n:9187_0: Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sati bhagavatā ka yamāne nimitte
anya-e1208n:9190_0: Yāceyyāsi yadi dasabalaṃ ce paṭikkhippa vācā
anya-e1208n:9192_0: Naṇvā’kkhāto samaṇa paṭigacceva me saṅkhataṃ yaṃ
anya-e1208n:9193_0: Jātaṃ bhūtaṃ avipariṇataṃ taṃ kuto’ pe’ttha labbhā; ()
anya-e1208n:9197_0: Yāsā vācā yathariva chiyāmuttakhāṇo tathā taṃ
anya-e1208n:9211_0: Yete dhammā sayamadhigatā desitā sādhukaṃ vo,
anya-e1208n:9228_0: Oloketvā ida mavaca me pacchimaṃ dassana’nti; ()
anya-e1208n:9235_0: Tisso sikkhā pariharatha vo sādhukaṃ bhikkhave’ti
anya-e1208n:9245_0: Eso dhammo bhavati vinayo sāsanaṃ satthu cedaṃ
anya-e1208n:9246_0: Abbhaññātaṃ vata bhagavato sammukhā me sutanti,
anya-e1208n:9247_0: Sakkhīkatvā yadi vadati maṃ bhikkhave koci bhikkhu
anya-e1208n:9258_0: Yvābhiññāto paṭibalataro bhikkhu vā sammukhā me
anya-e1208n:9302_0: Yaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ narahari tahiṃ vissamatto nisajja,
anya-e1208n:9313_0: Sakkā bhante savati kakudhāsindhu gattāni sīkiṃ
anya-e1208n:9316_0: Evaṃ vutte puna bhagavatā codito pattahattho
anya-e1208n:9334_0: Datvā buddhaṃ saraṇa magamā sāṭakaṃ siṅgīvaṇṇaṃ; ()
anya-e1208n:9347_0: Dve me laddhā samasamaphalā piṇḍapātā visiṭṭhā,
anya-e1208n:9349_0: Sse’vaṃ vatvā pariharatu tañcāha me accayena; ()
anya-e1208n:9378_0: Yo kho dhammaṃ carati samaṇo’ pāsako vā’nudhammaṃ
anya-e1208n:9379_0: Bhatyā so maṃ paramavidhānā kamānaye pūjayeti; ()
anya-e1208n:9391_0: Kandantīnaṃ pakiriya sake kesapāse ca bāhā
anya-e1208n:9432_0: Theraṃ mākhovilapi ala mānanda māsoci hevaṃ,
anya-e1208n:9439_0: Ātāpī so tvamasi nipapako hesi khīṇāsavoti; ()
anya-e1208n:9457_0: Rājā hutvā cira manubhaviṃ dhammiko dhammarājā,
anya-e1208n:9468_0: Uyyānaṃ te pavisiya tadā mallaputtā ca mallā
anya-e1208n:9481_0: Okāsaṃ me dadatha samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ pucchanāya
anya-e1208n:9483_0: Vutte satthā kilamati alaṃhāvuso mā vihaññi
anya-e1208n:9496_0: Paññatto yo bhavati vinayo desito yoca dhammo
anya-e1208n:9497_0: So vo satthā paramasaraṇo’tyā’ha me accayena,
anya-e1208n:9501_0: Paccakkho no bhavi dasabalo pucchituṃ sammukhā taṃ
anya-e1208n:9504_0: Saṅghe magge vimati yadivo bhikkhave pucchathāti; ()
anya-e1208n:9506_0: Yasmā khandhe pajahati jino bhikkhave bhandadāni
anya-e1208n:9516_0: Taṃ taṃ jhānaṃ muni paṭisamāpajjamāno nirodhā
anya-e1208n:9540_0: Itimedhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santike nidāne
anya-e1208n:9541_0: Parinibbute bhagavati sahaparinibbānā brahmāsahampati imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi.
anya-e1208n:9545_0: Parinibbute bhagavati sahaparinibbānāsakko devānamindo imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi.
anya-e1208n:9548_0: Parinibbute bhagavati sahaparinibbānā āyasmā anuruddho imā gāthāyo abhāsi.
anya-e1208n:9553_0: Parinibbute bhagavati sahaparinibbānā āyasmā ānando imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi.
anya-e1208n:9833_0: Bhatyā punappuna mimaṃ sarataṃ sataṃ bho,
anya-e1208n:9911_0: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadāna nidāne jinavaṃsadīpe santikenidāne
